arabic_text: هَٰذَا بَصَٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ
translation: 20. This (Qur’an) is a clear insight and evidence for mankind, and a guidance and a mercy for people who have Faith with certainty.[2]
footnotes:
(V.45:20)
a) See the footnote of (V.10:37).
b) See the footnote of (V.3:85).
